summary: Generate building instructions image for LEGO mosaic.
description: Creates an instruction image from a legofied image using the stored brick information.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: A legofied image with brick information in metadata.

parameters.name: grid_size
parameters.description: Size of each grid cell in pixels for the instruction image.

parameters.name: include_legend
parameters.description: Whether to include a color legend with brick counts.

returns.description: An image containing the building instructions.

InvalidInput.message: The input image must be legofied with brick information in metadata.
